info.name: Binance spot API
info.description:
Binance official supported Postman collections.
- API documents: https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en/#change-log - Telegram: https://t.me/binance_api_english - Open Issue at: https://github.com/binance-exchange/binance-api-postman
